docs.snippet: President Michel Temer's government expects a federal judge to recommend his removal for illegal campaign funding but believes it can stall a final decision by Brazil's top electoral court until after he leaves office next year, aides said....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Michel Temer's government expects a federal judge to recommend his removal for illegal campaign funding but believes it can stall a final decision by Brazil's top electoral court until after he leaves office next year, aides said.

headline.main: Brazil's Temer Plays for Time in Case That Could Unseat Him
headline.print_headline: Brazil's Temer Plays for Time in Case That Could Unseat Him

docs.snippet: Oregon lawmakers worried about a nationwide crackdown on legalized marijuana under the Trump administration are rushing to protect the personal information of pot customers....
docs.lead_paragraph: Oregon lawmakers worried about a nationwide crackdown on legalized marijuana under the Trump administration are rushing to protect the personal information of pot customers.

headline.main: Oregon Lawmakers Push to Protect Pot Users' Info From US
headline.print_headline: Oregon Lawmakers Push to Protect Pot Users' Info From US
